Author: Chalkos
Name: RepairMe
Punchline: Never forget to repair & extract materia again!
Description: Helps you notice when your gear needs to be repaired or has materia to be extracted. /repairme to config
Changelog:
v1.0.0.4
  set api5 (no code changes)
v1.0.0.3
  Now supports more than 100% condition
v1.0.0.2
  Fix `System.AccessViolationException` in `GetConditionInfo()`
    shouldn't crash on logout/disconnect anymore
